connector.description:
Send messages to Google Functions.

The serviceAccountKey property needs to be a path to a service account key file.

camel.kamelet.google-functions-sink.proj.name: camel.kamelet.google-functions-sink.projectId
camel.kamelet.google-functions-sink.proj.description: The Google Cloud Functions Project Id

camel.kamelet.google-functions-sink.regi.name: camel.kamelet.google-functions-sink.region
camel.kamelet.google-functions-sink.regi.description: The Region where the Google Cloud Functions has been deployed

camel.kamelet.google-functions-sink.serv.name: camel.kamelet.google-functions-sink.serviceAccountKey
camel.kamelet.google-functions-sink.serv.description: The Service account key that can be used as credentials for the Google Cloud Functions platform
